text:
Ryan insisted that he was clean and “doing well, and life could not be better” when he spoke to Us Weekly right after leaving rehab the first time.

But after being arrested back in July for another heroin charge, we can see that wasn't the case. A source also told Us Weekly that Ryan was "in complete denial" about his drug addition, and now it seems as though his denial has turned into another visit to rehab -- hopefully his last.

Ryan's ex and fellow Teen Mom OG star Maci Bookout was just granted a two-year order of protection against him, and we wouldn't be surprised if she tries to extend that order now that he's running into more issues.
title: 'Teen Mom OG' Star Ryan Edwards Has Reportedly Checked Back Into Rehab

meta_data.description: The hits just keep on coming for 'Teen Mom OG' alum Ryan Edwards.
